game.name: Funny Animals Memory
game.description:
Memory games have their huge fan base all across the world. If you also want to improve your brain memory, play this brand new arcade challenge where you have to spot all matching images to win. Choose your level among easy, medium, hard and expert and click on the button of start new game in Funny Animals Memory! This lovely puzzle challenge is perfect for all individuals who love playing with animals and generally seeking for the ways to boost their memory. 

The number of pictures will keep increasing as you progress from easy to hard level. Try to find out all the matching pictures in the shortest possible time to score highest out of 100 in this html5 puzzle game! Your quick reflexes and sharp memory abilities will help you to gain a lot of points. Make sure to achieve the goal of the game before the time expires. When your game is finished, you can track your score on the middle of your computer screen. 

Different levels supported by different number of images will be enough to keep you engrossed for hours. There would be no chance of getting bored since the fun and entertainment level is very high. Check out more memory games that are free to play online on atmegame.com and allow you to be a part of the best puzzle world! This kids puzzle is suitable for kids, teenagers and grown-ups and playable on multiple devices, including mobile phones, desktops, tablets and iPads or iPhones.
